attributes.action: Call for a General Election so that we, the electorate, can judge whether our own MP can be trusted to represent us in Parliament, given the ongoing expenses scandal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, as the electorate, have now had plenty of time to listen to the debate and information on the ongoing MP's expenses scandal. Rather than have the MPs, Party Leaders, so called political experts and members of the press tell us what we should be thinking it is now time for the voting people of this country to have our say. Let us decide whether we can trust our local MP to represent us in the House of Parliament in the only way possible, by means of a General Election. Do the decent thing and call a General Election now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
